Package com.peyrona.mingle.lang.interfaces

Interface ICandi.ILanguage

  • Enclosing interface:
    ICandi
    public static interface ICandi.ILanguage

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Binds sInvokerUID to ICandi.IPrepared.

      ICandi.IPrepared prepare​(java.lang.String sSource, java.lang.String call)
      Provides the opportunity to compile or in any other way pre-process the source code.
      ICandi.IPrepared prepare​(java.util.List<java.net.URI> lstURIs, java.lang.String call)
      If target code is already compiled, it is directly executed, otherwise this method provides the opportunity to compile or in any other way pre-process the source code previously to execute it.
      Implementations (like Java) will compile source code into byte-codes, others (like JavaScript) will simply return the received source code.

    • Method Detail

      • prepare

        ICandi.IPrepared prepare​(java.lang.String sSource,
                         java.lang.String call)
        Provides the opportunity to compile or in any other way pre-process the source code.

        Implementations (like Java) will compile source code into byte-codes, others (like JavaScript) will simply return the received source code.

        Parameters:
        sSource - Source code to be compiled.
        call - Entry point.
        Returns:
        An instance of IPrepared.

      • prepare

        ICandi.IPrepared prepare​(java.util.List<java.net.URI> lstURIs,
                         java.lang.String call)
        If target code is already compiled, it is directly executed, otherwise this method provides the opportunity to compile or in any other way pre-process the source code previously to execute it.
        Implementations (like Java) will compile source code into byte-codes, others (like JavaScript) will simply return the received source code.
        Parameters:
        lstURIs - Compiled code (normally JAR files).
        call - Entry point.
        sCallName - Entry point (function) name: the SCRIPT's CALL clause.
        Returns:
        An instance of IPrepared.

      • bind

        void bind​(java.lang.String sInvokerUID,
          ICandi.IPrepared prepared)
        Binds sInvokerUID to ICandi.IPrepared.
        Parameters:
        sInvokerUID - An Unique ID, e.g. the SCRIPT name.
        prepared - What was returned by ::prepare(...).

      • execute

        void execute​(java.lang.String sInvokerUID,
             IRuntime rt)
      throws java.lang.Exception
        Executes a piece of code (previously prepared).Normally this method is invoked by SCRIPT:execute(...) method.

        Information can be sent back to the Mingle ExEn by sending a Message via bus: e.g.: rt:bus().post( ... )

        Parameters:
        sInvokerUID - An Unique ID, e.g. the SCRIPT name.
        rt - An instance of current IRuntime.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If something goes wrong.

      • newController

        IController newController​(java.lang.String sInvokerUID)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a new instance of IConntroller.
        Parameters:
        sInvokerUID - An Unique ID, e.g. the SCRIPT name.
        Returns:
        An instance of IController.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
